extension_name.message: Saladict, a Feature-Rich Inline Translator. Chrome / Firefox Extension.

extension_description.message: Saladict is a professional word-translation extension, created for cross-reading.  It's large number of authoritative dictionaries cover English, French, Japanese, and Spanish, and support complex word processing, web page translation, word books, and PDF browsing.

command_open_quick_search.message: Open or highlight standalone dict panel

command_search_clipboard.message: Search clipboard content in Standalone Panel
